questions.question: What does a red octagon-shaped traffic sign mean?
questions.explanation: A red octagon-shaped traffic sign is universally recognized as a stop sign.

questions.question: What do flashing red traffic lights indicate?
questions.explanation: Flashing red traffic lights mean stop, then proceed when safe.

questions.question: When two vehicles arrive at an intersection without traffic signs or signals, who has the right of way?
questions.explanation: When two vehicles arrive at an intersection without signs or signals, the vehicle on the right has the right of way.

questions.question: What is the speed limit in a school zone in Pennsylvania when children are present?
questions.explanation: In Pennsylvania, the speed limit in a school zone when children are present is 15 mph.

questions.question: Is it legal to park in front of a public or private driveway in Pennsylvania?
options: Yes, but only for up to 10 minutes
Yes, but only if the driveway is not in use
questions.explanation: It is illegal to park in front of a public or private driveway in Pennsylvania.

questions.question: What should you do if your vehicle starts to skid on a wet road?
options: Brake hard and steer into the skid
Accelerate and steer into the skid
Ease off the gas and steer into the skid
Brake hard and steer away from the skid
questions.correctAnswer: Ease off the gas and steer into the skid
questions.explanation: If your vehicle starts to skid, you should ease off the gas and steer in the direction you want the vehicle to go.
